properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 11:41AM CST by NWS Shreveport LA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a

* FLOOD WARNING FOR
the Cypress Bayou At Wallace Lake south of Shreveport, Louisiana.
* from Thursday morning until further notice...or until the warning
is cancelled.
* At 11:00 AM Wednesday The pool stage was 149.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood pool stage is 151.0 feet.
* Forecast...Rise above flood pool stage by Thursday late morning and
continue to rise to near 151.5 feet by Thursday evening.  After
cresting by late Thursday, the lake will slowly recede some two to
four inches per day during Friday and this weekend.
* Impact...Minor lowland flooding around the lake and overflow across
access roads.  Move livestock to higher ground.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive vehicles through flooded waterways.  Use caution when
walking near flooded riverbanks.  Do not try to wade or swim in
flooded rivers and bayous.

For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website
address into your favorite web browser URL bar:
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv
